titles.title: 2D Pulmonary Alveolus Functional Tissue Unit (FTU) for Lung, v1.0

descriptions.description: This functional tissue unit (FTU) illustration was created from anatomical structures and cell types listed in the ASCT+B Table [Lung v1.1](https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM323.SGDF.945). Multiple histology atlases, especially “Human Microscopic Anatomy” (R.V. Krstić, 1994) and “Histology: A Text and Atlas” (Michael H. Ross, et al., 2003) were referenced. Especially helpful in determining the structure of the fibroblast cell types was [(Rodríguez-Castillo et al. 2018)](https://doi.org/10.1186/s12931-018-0837-5).

alternateIdentifiers.alternateIdentifier: Rachel Bajema 2022. 2D Pulmonary Alveolus Functional Tissue Unit (FTU) for Lung, v1.0. https://doi.org/10.48539/HBM626.KZVN.453. Accessed on May 6, 2022.
Rachel Bajema, Supriya Bidanta, Ellen Quardokus, Bruce W. Herr II, Katy Börner. 2022. [*HuBMAP CCF 2D Reference Object Library*](https://humanatlas.io/2d-ftu-illustrations). Accessed on May 6, 2022.
